law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any other provision of this title, a person may not catch or attempt to catch clams ...
law.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this title, a person may not catch or attempt to catch clams or oysters by power dredge, hydraulic clam dredge, or other mechanical means in the Atlantic Coastal Bays, as defined in § 8-1802 of this article.
